intro: Patrinia scabiosifolia var. nantcianensis, commonly known as the Nantou Patrinia, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Lamiaceae, which includes many aromatic herbs. The plant features opposite, ovate leaves with serrated edges and produces small, clustered blue or purple flowers. It is often found in moist, shaded environments such as mountain forests. Its botanical characteristics make it a distinctive species within its genus.
